# function: mkpasswd

Given a string password, returns the sha512 password hash.



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
mkpasswd(password string) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `password` (String) The password to hash.
